features.name: Mythic Ability
features.desc: At 1st rank and every odd mythic rank thereafter, select one new mythic ability.

features.name: Dragon Companion
features.desc: At 3rd rank, Azata gets a Dragon as an animal companion. Unlike normal animals of its kind, an animal companion's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g}, abilities, {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} advance as the Azata gains mythic ranks.

features.name: Song of Heroic Resolve
features.desc: Azata starts a performance that grants all allies within 50 feet a luck {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to half her mythic rank. Whenever an ally under this effect makes a successful saving throw, that ally is {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} + Azata's mythic rank.

features.name: Mythic Feat
features.desc:
Mythic characters gain mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} every even mythic rank. These feats can be selected only as part of mythic advancement, not as part of a character's normal advancement or in place of any other bonus feat.
Most mythic feats require a non-mythic feat as a prerequisite. These mythic feats enhance the benefits of their prerequisite feats, making them truly awe-inspiring. If a character doesn't possess any of the necessary prerequisite feats when she gains a mythic feat, she can wait to select a mythic feat until the next time she gains a mythic rank or level.

features.name: Superpowers
features.desc: Azata can choose from her superpowers to enhance herself.

features.name: Song of Broken Chains
features.desc: Azata starts a performance that grants all allies within 50 feet a freedom of movement effect and immunity to compulsion {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like abilities{/g}.

features.name: Song of Defiance
features.desc: Azata starts a performance that grants all allies within 50 feet {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/lawful and {g|Encyclopedia:Regeneration}Regeneration{/g} 5 (lawful).

features.name: Song of Courageous Defender
features.desc: Azata starts a performance that grants a chosen companion {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- and immunity to fear effects. All enemies in the 50-foot range from the Azata must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} or be forced to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} a chosen companion. Base DC to this saving throw is equal 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier.
